  * <h3 id="23">23. (**New**) Automatic instantiation of &#064;Spy, &#064;InjectMocks fields (Since 1.9)</h3>
  * <p>

+ * Mockito will now try to instantiate &#064;{@link Spy} and will instantiate &#064;{@link InjectMocks} fields
